actions.description: The mercane makes three Psi-Imbued Blade attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the mercane until the end of the target's next turn.
actions.name: Psi-Imbued Blade

actions.description:
The mercane casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
At will: detect magic, light

1/day each: dimension door, invisibility, mage armor (self only)
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)

languages: Common, Giant, telepathy 60 ft. (see also Mercane telepathy)
name: Mercane [BAM]

specialTraits.description: The mercane can communicate telepathically with any other mercane it knows, regardless of the distance between them.
specialTraits.name: Mercane Telepathy
